Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Hawaiian \Ha*wai"ian\ (h[.a]*w[imac]"yan), prop. a. Belonging to Hawaii or the Sandwich Islands, or to the people of Hawaii. -- n. A native of Hawaii. [1913 Webster]
Hawaiian adj : of or relating to or characteristic of the state or island of Hawaii or to the people or culture or language n 1: the Oceanic languages spoken on Hawaii 2: a resident of Hawaii
